transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Ha sir bolo na. Good morning. Maine kaha sir aap bataye aap kya bata rahe the ki sir aapko matlab ki sale matlab leads purchase karni thi na sir?
Executive: Han.
Customer: Aapke sir catalog mein ek bar check kariye by leads mein kya wo lead nahi dikh rahi hai us category ki?
Customer: Sir main wo nahi bol raha hu. Main bol raha tha ki jo baki ke companies hai usme direct contact kar sakte hai ki nahi?
Executive: Nahi sir direct unke number pe contact nahi kar paoge aapko agar unse connect karna hai na to uske liye sir aapko dekhiye jo hum aapko leads dete hain.
Customer: Han.
Executive: To aapko wo lead purchase karni padegi aur fir unko call karna padega unka number aa jata hai directly waise to aap main batata hu ek bar jaise aap apne by leads pe jao.
Customer: By leads pe to hu main abhi.
Executive: Han jab apne by leads purchase karte ho to lead manager pe jaiye ab aap.
Customer: Han lead manager pe.
Executive: Ab koi bhi by lead pe click karke kholiye.
Customer: Han.
Executive: Upar dekhiye ab unka personal number aa raha hoga sir likha hua. Han wo to aa raha hai wo to mere lead mein aayega na. Main aisa nahi chahta hu. Jo mere lead mein nahi aa rahe matlab kaise ki abhi wo samjho pharma company hai XYZ samjho.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Abhi usme mujhe bechna hai mera product.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To main wo kaise find karunga unka number?
Executive: Nahi sir wo direct number to possible nahi hai sir mil payega aapko.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Kyunki reason being ki
Executive: Kyunki sir aisa hai na dekhiye aap khud sochiye jaise aapki company hai agar aapko koi buyer ya to koi supplier hi call kare aur bole ke sir mujhe sale karni hai.
Executive: To thoda sa aap bhi irritate ho jaoge hai na?
Customer: Han.
Executive: Ab agar to ye cheez isi purpose se sir hum aapko direct number to provide nahi karte aap phone karoge unke preferred number pe hi wo IndiaMART pe land hoga ya fir aapko directly us pe hoga to us cheez se.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Matlab koshish aap ye rakho ke sir aap lead ke through baat karo to wo jyada better rahega.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: By leads ya fir direct inquiries call to aap sale directly wahi se kar sakte ho na sir aapko by leads hum dete hi hai isliye jisse aap buyer se connect kar pao.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Ek bar aap aap ek bar check karo abhi kitni leads aapko calcium carbonate ke regarding dikh rahi jiski aapko requirement thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dekhiye ek bar.
Customer: Calcium carbonate ki na. Han matlab jisko aapko sale karna tha na aapne jo mujhe bata rahe the parso ki aapko iski jo suppliers dekhne ek bar dekhiye kitna dikh raha hai.
Customer: Usme to dikh raha hai mujhe par jo call kar raha hu na wo usme IndiaMART pe land ho jata hai.
Executive: Nahi direct call pe to sir jo by leads purchase pe aap agar call kar rahe hoge to wo IndiaMART pe nahi ja raha hoga sir.
Customer: Nahi by lead pe to nahi jayega by lead pe to jiska number hai usko hi jayega wo to main samajh raha hu. Main uski baat hi nahi kar raha hu. Main alag baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Achcha. Thik hai main dekhta hu han. Wo main samajh gaya sir nahi directly aap agar call karoge na sir unko to wo to unke preferred number pe kyunki aap unka unko na personal number nahi mil pa raha hoga I guess.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Ye cheez hui hogi.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Okay okay.
Executive: Abhi ek bar sir mujhe data bata dijiye please sir wo calcium carbonate ka kitna aapke pass leads dikh raha hai is samay portal pe.
Customer: Abhi by lead mein four dikh raha hai. Kyunki reason being hua kya hai na sir jaise hi aapne unko call kiya tha to hamare pass ek feedback form open ho gaya sir aapka.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Unko laga ke sir aapko sale karna hai leads nahi mil rahi hai wo cheez ko lekin aapka concern dusra tha wo to mujhe kyunki aapko directly number chahiye tha unka hai na?
Customer: Han.
Executive: Isi wajah se aap dekh rahe ho company oriented call bhi ja rahi hai sir aapko is number se.
Customer: Hmm hmm sir.
Executive: To mujhe ek bar apne data bata dijiye sir aur uske alava aur kya issue face kar rahe ho aap sir jisse ki hum isko improve kar paye. Ek cheez aur hai sir aapki ek category isme dikh rahi hai mujhe lime powder isme hum kam kar rahe hain sir lime powder mein?
Customer: Lime powder mein kar rahe hai kam.
Executive: Aap isme sir products mein jao sir ek product add kariye.
Customer: Han.
Executive: Add new add product ka option aata hai na us pe click karke likhiye lime powder same name se kar do.
Customer: Aur price wagera mujhe pata nahi hai abhi. Nahi nahi price nahi dalne sir abhi aap bas sirf product add karna hai aapko. Aap isme prices mat karna bas save and continue karke aage badh jayiyega wo baad mein edit kar lena price. Lime powder. Han han bas.
Customer: Bas lime powder. Save and continue.
Executive: Han aage jo bhi aa raha hai agar wo cheez available hai aap pe to bhar dijiye warna fir wapis se save and continue karke aise hi upload kar do directly.
Customer: Finish kar do directly.
Executive: Han aap finish kar dijiye baki bas isme upload kar dena baad mein.
Customer: Ye kuch packaging size wagera dikha raha hai.
Executive: Koi nahi ye aap baad mein data leke na isko fill up kar lo na kar lena sara. Han.
Executive: Kyunki ye actually ho kya raha tha na ke is category ki aapne leads to purchase kar li thi consume kari but isme koi product mapping hi nahi thi jiski wajah se proper jo leads aani chahiye wo bhi nahi aa pa rahi thi.
Executive: Iske alava aur koi aur concern to nahi hai sir bas yahi tha na sir aapko ke call ka number chahiye tha directly buyer ka.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai sir to fir main ye concern close kar raha hu na aapke pass ek feedback jayega aapke jo main ID hai na us pe wo aapke pass access hai ki nahi hai mam ke pass hai?
Customer: Feedback ka to mere pass nahi hai.
Executive: Matlab jo primary mail ID hai na sir aapki company ki wo mam hi access karti hai. Han mam mam hi access karti hai. Chalega sir ek bar aapka concern iske regarding aayega to aap dekh lijiyega sir agar wo aapke pass ho to usko satisfy mark kar dijiyega thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Aur koi concern to nahi sir main wapis se aapko repeat kar raha hu. Nahi nahi thik hai.
Executive: Chalega sir koi koi baki
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants direct contact to other companies.

- Call lands on IndiaMART, not buyer directly.



Resolution:

- Explained leads purchase process for direct contact.

- Suggested using leads for better buyer connection.

- Asked to check calcium carbonate leads.

- Guided to add lime powder product.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, direct contact, product mapping, lime powder
